com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com sammy the seal pattern difficulty medium i assume you already know how to crochet how to crochet in the round how to read a pattern and how to sew pieces together supplies size g hook will make approx 6 seal ½ a skein of worsted weight yarn red heart super saver works nicely a scrap of color for the nose gauge is unimportant for this project terms single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase two single_crochet in same stitch decrease = decrease crochet two stitches together note this seal is worked in the round i join rounds and i single_crochet in the same space as joining so i m assuming that at the end of each round you are slip stitching to the first stitch of that round and that you chain 1 to start the next round you can work in spirals if that s easier for you just remember to mark your rounds you want your stitches to be tight and close together so the stuffing doesn t show through later on to start each piece you can chain 2 and work your 6 stitches into the 2nd stitch from the hook or you can use the magic magic_ring be creative and have fun page 2 of 9 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com the pattern the head and body row instructions stitches 1 **starting with nose color*** 6 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around including the slip_stitch from the previous round 7 3 single_crochet in 6 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in last stitch 8 **change to main body color** 4 single_crochet in next 8 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in last stitch increase 9 5 work even 9 6 *single_crochet in next 2 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around 12 7 *single_crochet in next 3 single_crochet increase in next single_crochet* around 15 8 single_crochet in next 6 single_crochet increase in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet in last 6 single_crochet 18 9 work even single_crochet in each single_crochet around 18 11 12 increase in first 3 single_crochet 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet in next 12 single_crochet increase in last 3 single_crochet 24 13 single_crochet in first 9 single_crochet decrease in next 3 single_crochet single_crochet in last 9 single_crochet 21 **stuff the nose at this point as it s hard to get to at the end** 14 2
